snippet: The British brokerage firm Tullett Prebon Group said it was being investigated over trades made by two former employees, including Noel Cryan, who had also been charged with manipulating interest rates.
abstract: The British brokerage firm Tullett Prebon Group said it was being investigated over trades made by two former employees, including Noel Cryan, who had also been charged with manipulating interest rates.

headline.main: Former Trader Ensnared in Libor Case Faces Another Inquiry
